mapper.sql: LOG_ID, RULE_ID, FOLDER_ID, STATE, HIT_RULE_NUM, START_TIME, END_TIME
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT (A .START_TIME) "value", MAX(b.RULE_NAME) "name", b.RULE_ID "ruleId", 'ruleId' "id" FROM CRE_RULE_LOG A, CRE_RULE_DETAIL b WHERE A .START_TIME >= TRUNC (SYSDATE - #{day}) AND A.RULE_ID = b.RULE_ID AND A.FOLDER_ID=#{folderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY b.RULE_ID
mapper.insert:
insert into CRE_RULE_LOG
LOG_ID,
RULE_ID,
FOLDER_ID,
STATE,
HIT_RULE_NUM,
START_TIME,
END_TIME,
INPUT_DATA,
OUTPUT_DATA,
EXCEPTION,
#{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ruleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{folderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{hitRuleNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{inputData,jdbcType=CLOB},
#{outputData,jdbcType=CLOB},
#{exception,jdbcType=CLOB},
mapper.update:
update CRE_RULE_LOG
RULE_ID = #{ruleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FOLDER_ID = #{folderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HIT_RULE_NUM = #{hitRuleNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
INPUT_DATA = #{inputData,jdbcType=CLOB},
OUTPUT_DATA = #{outputData,jdbcType=CLOB},
EXCEPTION = #{exception,jdbcType=CLOB},
where LOG_ID = #{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from CRE_RULE_LOG where START_TIME <= TRUNC(SYSDATE - #{day})
